body.name: mod
body.description: Moderate your server with these utility commands

options.name: log
options.description: Configure moderation command usage logging for this server

options.name: set
options.description: Set a channel for logging moderation command usage in this server

options.name: channel
options.description: The text channel you want moderation command usage to be logged in, or the current channel

options.name: show
options.description: Show the configuration of moderation command usage logging in this server

options.name: stop
options.description: Stop logging moderation command usage in this server
